name: Dave's Adventure (David J. Kalbfleisch)
description:
This is a limited clone of the 1980 Atari game Adventure, which popularized the concept of the "Easter egg."  True to the original, Dave's Adventure has a secret room.  Can you find it?

Use the arrow keys to move.  If you win and want to restart, refresh the page.

The original game has a magnet you can use to retrieve items that are otherwise out of reach.  I didn't implement that, so it's possible that items could become inaccessible.  You probably would have to make that happen on purpose.
